text:
just wondering, how long until drag n drop email comes out of beta?

I have a lot of feedback with how the current editor drag n drop email template builder works  but don’t want to waste someones time with it if it’s all going away/getting complete overhaul

Hey Jon! We're gearing up to release the drag and drop email editor along side the "classic" one to all customers in the next month. There'll be work following on from this to merge the classic and drag-and-drop email editor together again, along with merging together the underlying template technology. It's likely that the answer to your feedback might be "this will go away soon" but definitely worth sharing if you can :+1:
k, very excited about that. If I end up having to do another email and fight with the drag n drop template builder I’ll post some feedback maybe on the forums so it doesn’t get lost in slack history
That would be great, appreciate it Jon :+1:
